#summary Supported Command Line Arguments

=Silent=
{{{
ShareX.exe -s
}}}
or 
{{{
ShareX.exe -silent
}}}
ShareX loads to tray without showing the main window. 

=Multiple instance=
{{{
ShareX.exe -m
}}}
or 
{{{
ShareX.exe -multi
}}}
Forces ShareX to load another instance. 

=Portable mode=
{{{
ShareX.exe -p
}}}
or 
{{{
ShareX.exe -portable
}}}
Loads ShareX in portable mode.
